sections.heading: to 26-2-4 - Repealed.Section 26-2-4.1 - Recompiled.Section 26-2-5 to 26-2-14 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 270, § 10 repealed 26-2-1 to 26-2-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1971, ch. 244, §§ 1 to 3 and as amended by Laws 1987, ch. 265, § 4, relating to the Drug Abuse Act, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.For present comparable provisions,see9-7-6.1 to 9-7-6.3 NMSA 1978.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Laws 1999, ch. 270, § 9 recompiled 26-2-4.1 NMSA 1978, relating to the substance abuse education fund, as 9-7-17 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 1999.

sections.heading: to 26-2-14 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1999, ch. 270, § 10 repealed 26-2-5 to 26-2-14 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1971, ch. 244, §§ 5 to 12, Laws 1971, ch. 296, § 1 and Laws 1972, ch. 10, § 1, and as amended by Laws 1972, ch. 84, § 54, relating to drug abuse services, effective July 1, 1999. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1998 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.For present comparable provisions, see 9-7-6.1 to 9-7-6.3 NMSA 1978.
